column4: does anyone know if pdf is a format that can be "stretched" without distortion?
if you put a vector format image in it. yes
I've got to send this large poster type thing for printing, and its pdf. I wonder if that's good enough.
is it just a full page in acrobat ?
yeah, and everytime I try to print it, it never prints "borderless" on my printer.
its a large linux oriented poster 'Anatomy of a Linux System' :)
the text will be crisp. but the raster image in the middle will not
you can scale that text to the size of a building if yo u want
you can set that up easily, I remember I had it going like that (although I quickly turned it off because I kept triggering it by mistake)
i looked all through the prefs
thx., ill have a look and see if I can find it in there
if you have any questions about that, ask in #xgl -- they know their stuff.
